pages.text: The crafting table opens up complex recipes, and combining all our basic resources so far, we can now craft a basic flint pickaxe.  This item allows you to destroy stone and mine other low-level blocks and resources such as coal for your fires and furnaces.

Stone harvested via the use of the flint pickaxe can be used on the crafting table to craft stone tools, which are a basic upgrade to your flint options, as well as construct a furnance in which you can cook food and smelt or process other materials.
